Original title: The Masque of the Red Death
Year: 1964
Length: 89 min.
Country: United Kingdom
Directed by Roger Corman
Writer: Charles Beaumont & R. Wright Campbell ( Tales : Edgar Allan Poe )
Music: David Lee
Photo: Nicolas Roeg
Starring: Vincent Price, Hazel Court, Jane Asher, David Weston, Nigel Green, Patrick Magee, Paul Whitsun -Jones, Robert Brown, Julian Burton, David Davies, Skip Martin, Gaye Brown, Verina Greenlaw, Doreen Dawn , Brian Hewlett, Sarah Brackett
Studio: Alta Vista Productions / American International Pictures
Genre: Horror | Ages. XII century

Synopsis:
---------
Middle Ages XII century. Inspired by the eponymous story by Edgar Allan Poe ( 1809-1849 ) . While a devastating plague , known as the Red - Death decimated the population of a small Italian province, the sadistic Prince Prospero and eccentric locks with friends in one of his castellated properties to prevent infection . To escape the tragedy , decided to organize a masquerade party, where the guests subjected to all sorts of depraved games of which they can only go two innocent unscathed.
